akas: Giada kocht - Happy Family Food Germany
akas from release info: Giada kocht - Happy Family Food Germany

1.title: Football's Top Four
1.plot: Giada puts her own spin on popular snacks for football fans, including sticky baked chicken wings with a Korean twist; a French lentil-and-hominy chili; mini twice-baked potatoes; and a roasted mushroom-and-kale pizzette.

2.title: Chocolate Kisses
2.plot: Chocolate Valentine's Day treats are prepared, including Brazilian-style truffles, double-chocolate-glazed donuts, and red-velvet whoopie pies filled with chocolate-cheese cream.

3.title: Hooray for Hollywood
3.plot: Giada takes inspiration from old Hollywood, when preparing a menu that includes veal saltimbocca; a smoky, meaty chili; and orange sticky buns.

4.title: Late Night Munchies
4.plot: Light night munchies are prepared, including mortadella bites, an Italian Monte Cristo, pretzel-crusted chicken fingers with curry ketchup, and a chocolate-curry ice cream float.

5.title: Springtime Celebrations
5.plot: Giada creates a springtime feast to celebrate the season with family and friends. On the menu: herb-roasted pork loin with gremolata; grilled potato salad; peas, bacon and Prosecco; raspberry clafoutis.

6.title: Starry, Starry Night
6.plot: Giada prepares small bites for a cocktail party with a star theme. On the menu: bacon-wrapped dates with lemon-basil crema; crostini with ricotta and pink peppercorns; chocolate-amaretti cookies.

7.title: The Steak House
7.plot: Giada visits a Los Angeles butcher to learn about different cuts of meat, before returning to her kitchen to make 3 steak dishes and special cocktail. On the menu: broiled porterhouse with salmoriglio; flat iron steak with piquillo-pepper pesto.

8.title: Friends for Lunch
8.plot: Giada prepares a kid-friendly lunch, which includes chicken Parmesan sandwiches; creamy cucumber salad; and chocolate fluffy peanut butter sundaes.

9.title: 15-Minute Pastas
9.plot: Giada demonstrates four pasta dishes that can be made in 15 minutes. Included: gemelli with kale pesto and olives; penne with corn and spicy sausage; orecchiette with broccoli; and pecorino and orzo with cherry tomatoes, feta and mint.

10.title: Raffy's in the House
10.plot: Aunt Raffy joins Giada in the kitchen for a day of fun and laughter, while her sister, Eloisa De Laurentiis, joins them to try their family dishes of Polpettone Two Ways, Quinoa Pilaf and Aunt Raffy's Peach and Blueberry Crisp.

11.title: Not Your Grandmother's Tea Party
11.plot: Giada puts a modern spin on a tea party. On the menu: tre fagioli with fregola; open-faced tuna sandwiches with white bean spread; lavender-chamomile spritzer; and milk-and-honey cake.

12.title: Giada's Tasting Menu
12.plot: Fennel is the featured ingredient, when Giada creates a small plate tasting menu for some of her friends. Dishes include a citrus-fennel salad; pan-roasted salmon with fennel puree; fennel upside-down cake; and a fennel martini made with fennel vodka.

13.title: East Meets Italy
13.plot: Giada explores Japanese-Italian fusion in Los Angeles. Also: she prepares recipes for blistered shishito pepper with olive-and-basil salt; Asian mushroom risotto; and Far East spaghetti.

14.title: Episode #8.14
14.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Rock the Block
1.plot: Giada coordinates a neighborhood block party. The three recipes given are "Blueberry and Marscarpone Turnovers", "Chicken and Shrimp with Pancetta Chimichurri" and "Orecchiette with Greens, Garbanzo Beans and Ricotta Salata".

2.title: Tricks or Treats
2.plot: Giada throws a Halloween party for her friends and their children. The three recipes given are "Chocolate-Dipped Nougat with Dried Apricots", "Halloween Popcorn Treats" and "Halloween Spice Cake".

3.title: Remembering Rome
3.plot: Giada and her family cook food reminiscent Rome, Italy, Giada's birthplace. The recipes shared are "Vegetable Fritto Misto with Lemon Mayonnaise" and "Bucatini All'Amatriciana with Spicy Smoked Mozzarella Meatballs".

4.title: Garden Party
4.plot: Giada celebrates Earth Day with a party menu centered on fresh, local ingredients from her garden and the local farmers' market. Recipes for the party include "Red Snapper with Fava Bean Puree", "Fried Cheese-Stuffed Zucchini Blossoms" and "Mini Pineapple Cakes".

5.title: Food and Fashion
5.plot: Giada hosts her fashion designer friends for an evening of high style in both food and clothing. The day's recipes are "Shrimp Spring Rolls with Cucumber-Yogurt Dip", "Beef Pops with Pineapple and Parsley Sauce" and "Blended Cherry Mojitos".

6.title: A Family Thanksgiving
6.plot: Giada's Thanksgiving menu includes "Poached Pears in Honey, Ginger and Cinnamon Syrup", "Sweet and Savory Bread Pudding" and "Spiced Turkey Breast".

7.title: California BBQ
7.plot: Giada dines al fresco with "Spicy Chocolate Milkshakes", "Mini Italian Pub Burgers" and "Beer-Battered Apple and Onion Rings".

8.title: Lobster Bake
8.plot: Giada and her friends cook lobster in a hole dug on the beach. The three recipes given are "Lobster Tails with Clarified Butter", "Corn and Black Bean Salad with Basil-Lime Vinaigrette" and "Spiked Watermelon Pops".

9.title: Secret Santa
9.plot: Giada and her Christmas party guests do a secret Santa exchange. The party menu includes "Cranberry and Cornmeal Cake with Caramel-Walnut Topping Sauce", "Grilled and Stuffed Portobello Mushrooms with Gorgonzola" and "Penne with Shrimp and Herbed Cream Sauce".

10.title: Breakfast for Dinner
10.plot: Giada creates a special dinner menu, using dishes more commonly found on the breakfast table. The three recipes shared are "Baked Gruyere and Sausage Omelet", "Pancetta and Cinnamon Waffles" and an "Espresso Nightcap with Vanilla Whipped Cream". Also: "Lamill Coffee" in Los Angeles is visited.

11.title: Recipe Sharing
11.plot: Giada and her aunt Raffy share their family recipes for "Fig and Almond Tart" and "Nonna Luna's Rice".

12.title: A Day of Indulgence
12.plot: Giada has a spa day with two of her girlfriends and shares healthy recipes for a "Sweet Basil Smoothie", "Chocolate Rice Pudding" and "Roasted Tomatoes with Garlic, Gorgonzola and Herbs".

13.title: California Light and Healthy
13.plot: Giada creates a citrus themed menu and shares recipes for "Grilled Chicken and Avocado Napoleons", "Angel Food Cake with Lemon Honey Yogurt Sauce" and "Citrus Salad".

14.title: Moroccan Magic
14.plot: Giada hosts a Moroccan themed party and shares her recipes for "Honey-Balsamic Lamb Chops", "Couscous Cakes" and "Hibiscus Tea with Vodka and Citrus".

15.title: California Sushi
15.plot: Giada teaches her friends to roll their own sushi and shares recipes for a "Fun Salmon Hand Roll", a "Crab, Avocado and Mango Roll" and "Vegetable Rolls with Chili Mayonnaise".

16.title: Polo Brunch
16.plot: Giada prepares a picnic brunch to take to a polo match. The menu includes "Champagne Sangria", "Crispy Parmesan Biscuits" and "Espresso Chip Meringues".

17.title: Table for Two
17.plot: Giada and her husband Todd share a romantic evening while daughter Jade stays with a sitter. The recipes shared are "Roasted Citrus-Herb Game Hen", "Crouton Salad" and "Olive and Sun-Dried Tomato Vegetables".

18.title: We'll Always Have Paris
18.plot: Giada and Todd reminisce about a recent trip to France with a menu inspired by the trip. The recipes shared are "Parisian Steak and Cheese Croissant Sandwiches", "Fresh Mushroom and Parsley Salad" and "Raspberry Rose Pots de Creme".

19.title: Bridal Shower
19.plot: Giada hosts a bridal shower for a friend. The bride-to-be is given gifts and recipes for "Open-Faced Tuna Sandwiches with Arugula and Sweet-Pickle Mayonnaise", "White Bean and Roasted Eggplant Hummus" and "Coffee-Glazed Zeppole" are shared.

20.title: Happy Trails
20.plot: Giada and Todd go on a hike, but before they do, Giada prepares the food that they will eat on the trail. Recipes include Giada's "Homemade Cranberry Nut Granola", "Grilled Vegetable, Herb and Goat Cheese Sandwiches" and "Chocolate Raspberry Bars with White Chocolate and Almonds".

21.title: Art House
21.plot: Giada turns her home into an art gallery for the night to showcase a friend's work. She prepares appetizers for the crowd and shares recipes for "Skewered Greek Salad", "Italian Fried Olives" and "Sautéed Shrimp Cocktail".

22.title: Picnic in the Park
22.plot: Giada creates a portable dinner to share with her friends at an outdoor concert. The three recipes shared are "Deviled Eggs with Crab", "Caponata Panini" and a "Chocolate Honey Almond Tart".

23.title: Spring Fling
23.plot: Giada celebrates the arrival of spring with "Crispy Rack of Lamb with Honey and Mascarpone", "Heirloom Tomato and Basil Tart" and "Lemon Thyme Bars".

24.title: Lazy Day Lunch
24.plot: Giada prepares a lunch for a quiet day spent indoors. The menu consists of "Grilled Asparagus and Melon Salad", "Fusilli with Spicy Pesto" and "Espresso Caramel Bars".

25.title: Cocktails with Couples
25.plot: Giada and Todd share cocktails and appetizers with their friends. Recipes include "Spiced Cocktail Nuts", "Cheese-Stuffed Dates with Prosciutto", "Crispy Zucchini and Potato Pancakes" and a "Blueberry-Limoncello Cooler".

26.title: Pasta Party
26.plot: Giada shares three pasta dishes ranging from appetizers to desserts, including "Pasta Ponza", a family tradition. The other two recipes given are "Spaghetti with Beef, Smoked Almonds and Basil" and "Ricotta and Vanilla Ravioli with Orange Mint Dipping Sauce".

27.title: Mother's Day Brunch
27.plot: Giada hosts a brunch for her girlfriends with children. The menu consists of "Baked French Toast with Blueberries", "Steak Involtini" and "Frozen Banana Ice Cream Sandwiches".

28.title: Food and Fun
28.plot: Giada creates a dinner that she feels will be loved by both children and adults. The three recipes shared are "Zucchini and Olive Flatbread", "Cauliflower and Bacon Gratin" and "Mascarpone Chocolate Toffee Bars".

29.title: Many Thanks
29.plot: Giada creates a special meal to thank the people who work behind the scenes on the show. Each recipe is a personal favorite of one of the members of Giada's team. Recipes include "Smoked Salmon and Apple Carpaccio", "Brown Butter Risotto with Lobster" and "Cinnamon Twists with Cardamom-Honey Dipping Sauce".

30.title: Last Minute Menu
30.plot: Giada teaches viewers how to make a quick meal for unexpected guests that will look like the cook spent the whole day in the kitchen. The recipes prepared are "Israeli Couscous with Apples, Cranberries and Herbs", "Chicken Burgers with Garlic-Rosemary Mayonnaise" and "Toasted Pound Cake with Citrus Cream".

31.title: Around the World
31.plot: Giada makes dishes from Trinidad, India and Italy. The three recipes shared are "Mango and Lime Lassi", "Citrus Rice Salad" and "Trinidadian Chicken Stew".

32.title: Father's Day Party
32.plot: Giada and Todd celebrate Father's day with Todd's brother, another male friend, and the children belonging to each of the men. Recipes include "Egg, Gorgonzola and Pancetta Sandwiches", "Mozzarella, Raspberry and Brown Sugar Panini" and "Sweet Apple Iced Tea".

33.title: Dinner with the Band
33.plot: Giada throws a party in honor of her musician friends who have just released a new album. The menu includes "Penne with Braised Short Ribs", "Bibb Salad with Parmesan Butter Crostini" and "Apple Cider Shandy".

34.title: More Cheese Please
34.plot: Giada makes a menu inspired by cheese. The three recipes given are "Turkey Meatloaf with Feta and Sun-Dried Tomatoes", "Cheesy Baked Farro" and "Crostata with Apples, Walnuts and Gorgonzola".

35.title: Beach Volleyball
35.plot: Giada packs snacks for the beach, where she and her brother, Igor, play a game of volleyball. The recipes shared are "Perfectly Crunchy Slaw", Thyme Pasta Frittata" and "Chocolate Chip Walnut Cupcakes".

36.title: Road Trip Picnic
36.plot: Giada packs a picnic lunch for a day trip with Todd and Jade. The three recipes shared are "Chicken and Arugula Pita Pockets", "Penne with Treviso and Goat Cheese" and "Raspberry-Vanilla Smoothie".

37.title: Surf's Up
37.plot: Giada prepares a meal for Todd and his friend to enjoy after a day of surfing. The recipes shared are "White Bean and Chicken Chili", "Cheddar and Scallion Bread" and "Limoncello Granita".

38.title: Welcome Home
38.plot: Giada makes a meal to welcome her "little aunt" Carolyna, who is visiting from college. The recipes given are "Turkey Milanese", "Bacon and Pancetta Potatoes" and "Roasted Apple Pies with Whipped Cream".

39.title: Busy Day Menu
39.plot: Giada shares breakfast, lunch and dinner recipes that can be prepared quickly to prevent busy people eating on the run. Recipes shared are "Ricotta Parfaits", "Asian Chicken Salad" and "Ravioli with Arugula, Tomatoes and Pancetta".

40.title: Sweet Treats
40.plot: Giada makes desserts to give as surprise gifts. The special sweets made are "Strawberry and Rosemary Scones", "Chocolate-Hazelnut Dipped Fruit" and "Pomegranate and Mint Sorbet".

41.title: Small Bites
41.plot: Giada makes finger food variations of favorite recipes. The four appetizers made are "Stuffed Baby Peppers", "Tomato Basil Tartlets", Apricot and Walnut Phyllo Cups" and "While Wheat Pita Chips with Mascarpone-Chive Dipping Sauce".

42.title: Dig in for a Cause
42.plot: Giada makes a picnic lunch to take with on her day volunteering in a community garden for OXFAM, a charity to combat world hunger. The portable foods prepared are "Smoked Salmon BLT", "Pecorino and Bean Salad" and "Ginger-Tea Lemonade".

43.title: Special Delivery
43.plot: Giada makes healthy, freezable dishes for a friend with a newborn baby. The recipes are "Egg White Frittata with Lox and Arugula", "Chicken Milanese with Tomato and Fennel" and "Mini Pancakes with Raspberry Sorbet and Chocolate Sauce".

44.title: Makeover
44.plot: Giada prepares lunch while makeup artist Julie gives guests makeovers. The dishes served are "Artichoke and Bean Crostini", Vegetable Parmesan" and "Melon and Mint Slush".

45.title: More for Less
45.plot: Giada stretches leftovers - and her budget - by adding a few simple ingredients. "Lemon Chicken Soup with Spaghetti", "Pea Pesto Crostini" and "Lemon-Mint Cake with Lemon Syrup" are the dishes made.

1.title: Bowling Night
1.plot: Giada makes a quick dinner at home, then packs up dessert to take to the bowling alley. Dishes made are "Grilled Pork and Fontina Sandwiches", "Red Potato and Tomato Salad" and "Mini Chocolate-Meringue Cupcakes".

2.title: Sugar Rush
2.plot: Giada creates Halloween treats for children. The goodies made are "Truffle Pops", "Homemade Orange Marshmallows" and "Smoked Almond Turtles".

3.title: Todd's Midwestern Favorites
3.plot: Giada creates a meal inspired by Todd's childhood favorites growing up in the Midwest. The recipes given are "Chicken and Cheddar Soufflé", "Pancetta and Saffron Rice" and "Todd's Orange Raspberry Cake".

4.title: Giada's Kidz Kitchen
4.plot: Giada shows children how to make "Baked Macaroni and Cheese Cupcakes", "Peanut Butter Granola Bars" and "Raspberry Ice Cream Sodas" when she teaches a special cooking class just for kids.

5.title: Thanksgiving
5.plot: Giada prepares "Honey Mustard Pork Roast with Bacon", "Butternut Squash Soup with Fontina Cheese Crostini" and "Chocolate, Chestnut and Orange Trifle" while Todd and the family play their traditional Thanksgiving bocce game on the lawn.

6.title: Housewarming
6.plot: Giada makes "Campanelle Pasta Salad", "Savory Biscotti" and "Mangoes and Raspberries in Prosecco Syrup" to take to her friend Val's housewarming party.

7.title: Christmas
7.plot: Giada serves "Calamari, Tomato and Caper Salad", "Roasted Beef Tenderloin with Basil-Curry Mayonnaise" and "Ricotta and Vanilla Bean Puddings" when her family gathers to celebrate Christmas.

8.title: Secret Santa
8.plot: Giada hosts her girlfriends for a secret Santa exchange and serves "Grilled and Stuffed Portobello Mushrooms with Gorganzola", "Penne with Shrimp and Herbed Cream Sauce" and "Cranberry Cornmeal Cake".

9.title: Body and Soul
9.plot: Giada and her girlfriends enjoy an afternoon of yoga and healthy eating. Recipes shared are "Watermelon with Watercress and Feta", "California-Style Chopped Salad with Shrimp" and "Fruit Spring Rolls".

10.title: Light and Delicious
10.plot: Giada prepares healthy meals to help dieters keep their New Year's resolutions. Recipes shared are "Grilled Salmon with Citrus Salsa Verde", "Caramelized Onion and Grapefruit Salad" and "Herbed Quinoa".

11.title: Smoke in the House
11.plot: Giada prepares "Breakfast Tart with Pancetta and Green Onions", "Almond Pancakes" and "Citrus Cream Smoothie" for her local fire department's annual pancake breakfast.

12.title: Jade's First Birthday
12.plot: Giada makes "Pastina with Peas and Carrots" and "Mini Meatball Sandies" for Jade's animal-themed first birthday party. She also prepares "Animal Sugar Cookies" for the kids to decorate themselves at the party.

13.title: Football Weekend
13.plot: Giada makes "Deep Fried Boccancini with Spicy Tomato and Garlic Chutney", "Twice Baked Potatoes with Mushrooms and Prosciutto" and "Cinnamon-Chocolate Fudge" while Todd and his friends watch football.

14.title: Giada's Sunset Brunch
14.plot: Giada gives brunch food a nighttime twist. Recipes shared are "Smoked Salmon Pizzette", "Eggs Florentine" and "Raspberry-Filled Crepes".

15.title: Northern Italian
15.plot: Giada explores the flavors of northern Italy by cooking "Trinette with Eggplant and Basil Pesto", "Ligurian Fish Stew" and "Crostata with Dried Apricots and Taleggio", each with a special wine pairing.

16.title: Comfort Food
16.plot: Giada and her sister-in-law, Kelly, spend time with their daughters and their favorite comfort foods. The dishes prepared are "Chicken, Artichoke and Cannellini Bean Spezzatino", "Bruschetta with Fontina and Greens" and "Peanut Butter Cookies with Blackberry Jam".

17.title: Play Date
17.plot: Giada makes a light lunch to enjoy with her sister while their children play. Recipes shared in this episode are "Penne with Almond Sauce", "Peach and Strawberry Crumble" and "Orange Iced Tea".

18.title: Basic Italian
18.plot: Giada treats her girlfriends to an authentic Italian meal. The dishes prepared are "Bruschetta with Shrimp, Tarragon and Arugula", "Pasta Alla Formiana" and "Stracciatella Semifreddo".

19.title: Aloha L.A.
19.plot: Giada hosts a luau with a menu of "Sweet and Spicy Chicken Drumettes", "Tilapia Fish Tacos with Arugula" and an "Aloha LA Cocktail".

20.title: When Life Gives You Lemons
20.plot: Giada and her friend Julie enjoy a lunch with lemons from Giada's own lemon tree as the feature ingredient. The meal's three courses are "Roasted Branzino with Lemons", "Fried Smashed Potatoes with Lemons" and "Lemon and Almond Rice Pudding".

21.title: Picnic at the Getty
21.plot: Giada brings a picnic lunch of "Penne with Butternut Squash and Goat Cheese", "Salmon Cakes with Lemon-Caper Yogurt Sauce" and "Apple and Mint Punch" to the J. Paul Getty Museum in Los Angeles.

22.title: Pizza Party
22.plot: Giada teaches viewers at home how to make "Caramelized Onion, Sausage and Basil Pizza", "Arugula, Ricotta and Smoked Mozzarella Pizza" and "Antipasto Calzone" from homemade pizza dough. She hosts a pizza party for her friends where they make their own pizzas and get lessons in tossing pizza dough by hand.

23.title: Lunch with Raffy
23.plot: Giada makes a special lunch for her Aunt Raffy, who can't resist helping out in the kitchen. The pair make "Brussels Sprout-Leaf Salad", "Mini Lasagnas with Sweet Corn and Mascarpone" and "Raspberry-Ricotta Mousse".

24.title: Todd Loves Thai
24.plot: Giada shops at an Asian grocery and surprises Todd with a meal consisting of some of his favorite Thai dishes: "Spicy Mint Beef", "Turkey Larb", "Veggies in Yellow Curry" and "Thai Iced Tea".

25.title: Walk for Life
25.plot: Giada and her friends and family participate in Walk for Life, a 5k walk to raise funds for cancer research. Each woman on the team walks in honor of a loved one who had the disease. Before the big marathon, Giada prepares a nutritious meal consisting of "Beef and Cannellini Bean Minestrone", "Farro with Cheese and Herbs" and "Apricot Oat Bars".

26.title: Tex Mex BBQ
26.plot: When friends return from a vacation in Mexico with a piñata for Jade, Giada is inspired to host a Tex-Mex fiesta for her girlfriends and their children. The menu for the party consists of "Chicken and Steak Fajitas", "Black Bean, Corn and Tomato Salad", "Spicy Tomato Salsa" and "Cinnamon-Espresso Churros".

27.title: Giada's Restaurant Favorites
27.plot: Giada recreates dishes from her travels at home with her own twist. Inspired by the Eskimo bars served at the Snake River Grill in Jackson Hole, Wyoming, she makes her own "Frozen Brownie Sundaes". The Santa Café's vegetarian rilleno in Santa Fe, New Mexico, lays the groundwork for Giada's "Couscous-Stuffed Peppers with Basil Sauce". Finally, a hometown favorite: Nonna Elvira's lasagna verde from Angelini Osteria in Los Angeles serves as inspiration for Giada's "Meaty Mushroom Lasagna".

28.title: Let Them Eat Cake
28.plot: Giada hosts a cake decorating "contest" for kids, where everyone is a winner. In addition to frosting and sprinkles, Giada serves up "Grilled Cheese with Spinach and Pancetta", "Fish Sticks with Marinara Sauce" and "Berry Lemonade" made with a special vanilla bean simple syrup.

29.title: Paint and Party
29.plot: Giada hosts a party at which her artist friend Greg instructs everyone on creating their very own mixed-media canvas paintings. Elegant bites of "Curried Couscous Salad" and "Spicy Chicken Tenders with Honey-Mustard" are served alongside vodka mojitos.

30.title: De Laurentiis Family Dinner
30.plot: Giada hosts her entire family for a dinner feast, and opts to serve Chinese food rather than their traditional Italian. The courses made are "Shrimp Siu Mai", "Orange and Pineapple Beef" and "Vegetable Chow Mein".

31.title: Totally Fried
31.plot: Giada demonstrates frying techniques while making a meal of four fried courses. The recipes shared are "Spicy Fried Chicken Drumettes", "Fried and Stuffed Rice Balls", "Green Bean and Asparagus Tarts" and "Fried Chocolate and Banana Ravioli".

32.title: No Stress Party
32.plot: Giada shows you how to create a stress-free party. Recipes and tips include grilled-beef skewers with sun-dried-tomato relish; sweet-basil cheesecake; ginger-lemon-and-lime martinis.

0.title: Thanksgiving 2
0.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Grill It Your Way
1.plot: Giada spotlights grilling recipes that can be adapted for individual tastes. On the menu are "Grilled Fish Kebobs with Parsley and Garlic Butter", "Grilled Sirloin Steaks with Pepper and Caper Salsa" and "Potato, Orange and Arugula Salad".

2.title: Elegant and Easy
2.plot: Giada and her friends dine 'al fresco' on a light lunch made with fresh ingredients from Giada's herb garden. Lunch consists of "Snap Pea and Cucumber Salad", "Chicken with Tarragon and White Wine" and "Baby Strawberry and Honey Pies".

3.title: All Dressed Up
3.plot: Giada creates an upscale menu for an intimate dinner party. The courses served are "Asparagus Soup with Herbed Goat Cheese", "Filet Mignon with Rosemary and Mushroom Gravy" and "Lemon and White Chocolate Pots de Creme".

4.title: Cooking School Made Easy
4.plot: Giada shares recipes for three desserts she learned to make while attending Le Cordon Bleu cooking school in Paris. The treats are "Chocolate and Cheese Danish", "Lemon Pavlovas with Berries" and "Honey-Almond Madelines".

5.title: Progressive Dinner Party
5.plot: The neighborhood plans a dinner party that "progresses" from one house to the next. One family hosts cocktail hour, another dessert, and in between, Giada and Todd serve the main course. Giada prepares "Roasted Pork with Smoky Red Pepper Sauce", "Garlic and Cheese Popovers" and "Lemony White Bean and Arugula Salad" for dinner.

6.title: Cucina Capri
6.plot: Giada reminisces about one of her favorite destinations, Capri, and shares recipes inspired by the island. Giada makes "Baked Panzanella Caprese", "Spicy Linguine with Clams and Mussels", "Lemon Profiteroles" and washes it all down with homemade "Orangecello".

7.title: College Rivalry
7.plot: Giada and Todd host a game-day party when their alma mater, UCLA, play their annual football game against Aunt Dina's school, USC. Giada makes gourmet snacks of "Potato and Kale Chips with Lemon Mayonnaise", "Italian Club Sandwiches" and "Chocolate Sandwich Cookies" to serve while she, her friends and family watch the game.

8.title: Sweet and Spooky
8.plot: Giada and her family host a Halloween party for their friends and neighbors. The "Halloween Peppermint Patties", "Mini Pumpkin Cupcakes with Chocolate Frosting" and "Caramel, Chocolate and Candy Apples" she serves are sweet treats that the whole family can enjoy.

9.title: Lunch with the Girls
9.plot: Giada creates an elegant midday feast of "Roasted Halibut with Pea and Mint Salad", "Tomato-Basil Bread Pudding" and "Blueberry-Thyme Collins" to share with her girlfriends.

10.title: Childhood Favorites
10.plot: When Giada's siblings come to dinner, she makes "Spiced Pork Chops with Sweet and Sour Glaze" for brother Igor and "Frigola Salad with Broccoli and Cippolini Onions" for sister Eloisa. Dessert is another childhood favorite: "Chocolate Mascarpone Pound Cake with Coffee Meringue Icing".

11.title: Flavors of Fall
11.plot: Giada creates a casual Thanksgiving day menu for an intimate celebration with Todd and Jade.

12.title: LA Nights
12.plot: Giada hosts an evening cocktail party, poolside, with appetizers and a DJ. On the menu: black forbidden rice with peaches and snap peas; shrimp-and-beef skewers with soy-and-scallion butter; ginger-honey-and-apple martinis.

13.title: Giada's Family Christmas
13.plot: Giada and her family gathers in Aspen, Colorado for Christmas.

14.title: Giada on Ice
14.plot: Giada, Jade & Todd to meet up with Brian Boitano at a rink in downtown LA.

15.title: One Pot Meals
15.plot: Here's 4 great recipes that can be made in a Dutch oven or a saucepan.

16.title: Sunday Brunch
16.plot: Sunday is spent eating a casual brunch with elegant touches.

17.title: Jade's Music Class
17.plot: Jade loves to sing and dance, so Giada hosts Jade's music class at home and makes a kid-friendly lunch. On the menu: PB&J crepes; "wagon wheel" pasta with pancetta and peas; herbed lamb chops with homemade ketchup; peach-and-strawberry soda.

18.title: Big Game
18.plot: Giada and Todd have friends over to watch the big game. A game-day spread, featuring Filipino chicken adobo; scallion-and-mozzarella cornbread; walnut-and-blue-cheese grapes; and chocolate-almond milkshakes.

19.title: Valentine's Day
19.plot: Giada makes some beautiful sweet treats to deliver on Valentine's Day.

20.title: A Few of My Favorite Things
20.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

21.title: Cooking with Raffy
21.plot: Giada and Raffy continue their recipe swapping tradition. They prepare Earl Grey iced tea; pasta rollatini with spinach and ricotta; strawberries in vinegar.

22.title: Total Comfort
22.plot: Giada enjoys some of her favorite comfort foods.

23.title: A Girl's Grill
23.plot: Giada grills for the girls, but it's not the usual barbecue. On the menu: grilled pineapple, bananas and grapes; grilled corn and cheese cakes; beet-apple-and-cheese pizettes.

24.title: Peruvian Food
24.plot: A Peruvian meal is made. On the menu: quinoa-and-purple-potato salad; chicken in chile sauce; citrus parfaits with pineapple and mango.

25.title: Golden Hour Beach Picnic
25.plot: Giada di Laurentiis serves a fun menu on the beach just before sunset. On the menu: Mediterranean halibut sandwiches; fried couscous salad; garbanzo-bean-and-olive tapenade; star-anise-and-cinnamon beer.

26.title: Celebrating Mom
26.plot: Giada invites her mother and sister to an intimate Mother's Day luncheon.

27.title: Dad's Day
27.plot: Giada de Laurentiis is hosting a casual Father's Day meal at her house.

28.title: Pool Party
28.plot: At a pool party for friends, Giada de Laurentiis creates a sun-filled menu.

29.title: The Heat Is On
29.plot: Giada de Laurentiis heats up the kitchen with spicy Italian food, including hot gazpacho; spicy meatballs and ravioli; and a fiery strawberry-and-chocolate dessert.

30.title: From Scratch
30.plot: Giada De Laurentiis goes old school, making recipes the old-fashioned way. She prepares mascarpone-and-lemon gnocchi; cinnamon-raisin bread; mixed-berry-and-thyme jam.

31.title: More for Your Money
31.plot: Giada gives us some money-smart recipes that saves a few dollars.

32.title: Treasure Hunt
32.plot: Giada de Laurentiis is pulling out all the stops for a fun kid's party. Menu include mini carrot-and-zucchini muffins.

33.title: Viewer's Choice: Vegetarian
33.plot: Giada De Laurentiis creates a vegetarian menu that anyone would flip over.

34.title: Surf and Turf
34.plot: Giada de Laurentiis makes a traditional, yet Cal vibe, surf & turf menu. Seafood penne, crab-stuffed peppers and honey-and-mustard-glazed pancetta are prepared.

35.title: Garden Variety
35.plot: Giada De Laurentiis uses ingredients pulled from her homegrown herbs. On the menu: tarragon-and-merlot truffles; sweet-basil-and-blackberry jam; lavender-and-lemon cookies; herb-and-orange negroni.

36.title: California Boat Cruise Picnic
36.plot: Giada de Laurentiis creates a picnic for a boat trip with Todd and Jade. Prepared: linguine with avocado-and-arugula pesto; grilled artichokes with creamy champagne vinaigrette; and lime-and-cornmeal cookies with a citrus glaze.

37.title: If I Could Have Lunch with Anyone
37.plot: Giada prepares French dishes for a casual lunch with Apollonia Poilane, owner of the legendary Poilane bakery in Paris.

38.title: Light and Fabulous
38.plot: A menu w/a healthy touch and recipes to kick off the new year. Healthful meals are made. including broiled tilapia with mustard-chive sauce; carrot-and-yam puree; wheat berries with strawberries and goat cheese; cantaloupe-and-mint granita.

39.title: Spring Has Sprung
39.plot: Giada de Laurentiis celebrates Easter with her family in the backyard.

40.title: Noona Luna's Recipe Diary
40.plot: Giada & Raffy spend an afternoon in the kitchen re-creating family dishes.

41.title: Elegant Appetizers
41.plot: Giada is hosting a cocktail party for her closest friends. She provides entertaining tips and creates easy dishes for an unforgettable evening. The appetizers include polenta bites with whipped goat cheese; mini-shrimp cakes with ginger butter; citrus-couscous cups.

42.title: Have Food Will Travel
42.plot: Giada de Laurentiis goes on vacation and prepares some dishes for the trip. Prepared: pirate pasta; cold cauliflower soup with bacon and croûtons; goat-cheese tarts with salmon and arugula.

43.title: Sweets and Treats
43.plot: Kids love surprises at Halloween. Giada De Laurentiis prepares entertaining and spooky treats for her young Halloween guests: Chocolate Apricot Bugs, Cinnamon Pumpkin Roll with Chocolate Filling and delicious Macaroon Lollipops.

44.title: Thanksgiving Favorites
44.plot: Giada De Laurentiis creates a fresh approach to a classic menu with Roasted Root Vegetable Salad, Pumpkin and Goat Cheese Risotto, and Cranberry-Orange Glazed Turkey for a memorable Thanksgiving.

1.title: Future Chefs
1.plot: Giada de Laurentiis mentors kids interested in food industry careers.

2.title: Giada's Chili Favorites
2.plot: Three versions of chili are made, including California turkey chili; vegetarian chili Verde; short-rib chili.

3.title: Bake Sale
3.plot: Giada makes chocolate-hazelnut drop cookies, apricot-and-salami scones and berry-ricotta tartlets for her nephew's bake sale.

4.title: Giada's Greek Feast
4.plot: Giada de Laurentiis makes a beautiful Greek Feast for a few friends.

5.title: Modern Italian
5.plot: Giada De Laurentiis makes traditional Italian recipes, then takes a turn.

6.title: Weeknight Meals
6.plot: School's back, Giada makes wonderful & easy weeknight meals, including balsamic-glazed salmon; rustic vegetable-and-polenta soup; baked potatoes with arugula sauce; fusilli with pecorino Romano.

7.title: Giada's Christmas Dinner
7.plot: Giada De Laurentiis celebrates the season by preparing a beautiful family meal. She cooks up a feast of Roasted Prime Rib With Thyme and Marsala, Mashed Potatoes With Kale, Pistachio, and Cherry and Chocolate Tart.

8.title: Rise and Shine
8.plot: Giada De Laurentiis gets the morning started with a gourmet approach to breakfast classics. She cooks up a Creamy Polenta with Bacon and Cranberries, Caramel-Hazelnut Rolls, Sausage and Egg Bake, and a refreshing Mimosa!

9.title: Power Boost
9.plot: Giada De Laurentiis prepares healthy, energizing recipes with amazing flavors for her New Year's Resolution! Giada uses fresh ingredients for a revitalizing menu.

10.title: Everyday Ingredients
10.plot: Prepared: meatball stew; artichoke soup with fresh mint; strawberry-cream parfaits.

11.title: Game Day Favorites
11.plot: Giada De Laurentiis cooks up some fabulous munchies that will leave her guests talking about the food and the football!

12.title: Italian Desserts
12.plot: Giada de Laurentiis feels right at home, making decadent Italian desserts, including chocolate salami; mostaccioli cookies; apple fritters.

13.title: Chocolate Heaven
13.plot: Giada De Laurentiis loves chocolate and shares her favorite mouth-watering recipes like a Homemade Chocolate-Hazelnut Spread, Double Chocolate and Mint Cookies, Brownie-Walnut Pie and a Chocolate-Espresso Martini!

14.title: Giada's Book Club
14.plot: Giada hosts her book club and creates a novel menu to match. On the menu: scallops with quinoa; salad with radicchio. pears and arugula; lemon meringue custard.

15.title: Pure Comfort
15.plot: Pork chops with apples and pancetta, three-cheese potato gratin and fried-banana splits are on the menu.

16.title: Market Fresh
16.plot: Giada de Laurentiis goes to the farmer's market for inspiration to create a delicious menu.

17.title: If I Could Have Lunch with Anyone 2
17.plot: Giada De Laurentiis invites another someone that she admires for lunch: Joan McNamara, owner of "Joan's on Third" in Los Angeles.

18.title: Baked Goodies
18.plot: Giada De Laurentiis is making baked goods, including s'more brownie bites; lemon carnival cookies; peach cake.

19.title: Jade Turns 3
19.plot: It's Jade's 3rd birthday, and Giada De Laurentiis makes a special birthday meal for Jade and her friends. The menu includes mini chicken-and-broccoli potpies and strawberry-filled cupcakes.

20.title: Spring Lunch
20.plot: A light and healthful springtime lunch menu, featuring linguine with shrimp, asparagus and cherry tomatoes; fennel salad with radishes and chives; and peach-raspberry-and-lime sangria.

21.title: Italian Food Tour
21.plot: Giada plans a meal inspired by four different regions of Italy. On the menu: mussels oreganata; Calabrese fried eggplant; campanelle with spicy-mint sauce; and Umbrian-style veal chops.

22.title: Book Club: Chapter Two
22.plot: Giada De Laurentiis hosts her book club and features a menu based on the surf romance "Groundswell."

23.title: Nonna Luna's Recipe Diary: Chapter 2
23.plot: Giada and Aunt Raffy spend an afternoon in the kitchen re-creating family dishes, including spinach loaf and baked risotto.

24.title: Backyard Campout
24.plot: Giada and Todd host a twilight party in their Malibu backyard, complete with camp-style food. She makes Lamb Sliders, Penne with Roasted Vegetables and Prosciutto and, to stay warm, White Hot Chocolate with Marshmallow Stirrers.

26.title: L.A. Steak Houses
26.plot: Giada hosts an intimate "steak house party" featuring Butter Lettuce Salad With Gorgonzola and Pear Vinaigrette, Grilled Ribeye With Tomato and Poblano Chili Sauce and Spiced Bourbon, Beer and Maple Martinis.

28.title: Go Fly a Kite
28.plot: Gruyere-and-spinach bakes, orzo with artichoke pesto and grilled corn, and strawberry-lemon meringue clouds are made for a beach picnic.

29.title: The Royal Treatment
29.plot: Giada gives a behind-the-scenes look at the luncheon she catered for Prince William and Catherine Duchess of Cambridge, during their California visit. Later, she prepares a meal inspired by the experience. On the menu: frico cups with shrimp and avocado; grilled vegetable towers; crunchy slaw; Scotch whiskey julips.

30.title: Stars and Stripes
30.plot: Giada plans a summertime menu for a backyard bash, including pork burgers with apple-onion chutney; chicken-sausage skewers; blueberry-and-peach crumb pie.

31.title: Alex's Lemonade Stand
31.plot: Go behind the scenes, with Giada and Suzanne Goin, as they plan a charity event for the "Alex's Lemonade Stand Foundation". On the menu: beet salad with marinated goat cheese; halibut with lemon butter and crispy shallots; and a unique maple-fig ice cream.

32.title: Girls Rock
32.plot: Giada and a few girlfriends take a rock-climbing lesson. Their picnic meal includes an Israeli couscous salad; chicken-and-honey-mustard pinwheels; and fig-almond-and-orange bars.

34.title: Weeknight Special
34.plot: Pork-tenderloin sandwiches, quinoa pilaf and spiced-thyme-and-lime iced tea complete a casual but elegant weeknight meal.

35.title: Tahitian Party
35.plot: Giada prepares a French Polynesian meal, inspired by her trip to Bora Bora. The menu includes mahimahi with mango-and-vanilla coulis.

37.title: Cooking with Kids
37.plot: Giada De Laurentiis creates simple recipes that Jade and her friends will love: yummy variations on children's favorites, Cheesy Pastry Puffs, Spaghetti Nests and Chocolate-Cranberry Treats.

38.title: Soccer and Snacks
38.plot: Giada invites members of the Los Angeles Galaxy over for a backyard bash. On the menu: turkey-and-spinach taquitos; Parmesan lavash chips with tomato-basil dip.

39.title: Pie Heaven
39.plot: Pie: it's the new cupcake. Pies can be social, comforting, sweet or savory. Giada makes some of her favorites: Apple and Cheese Pie, Raspberry and Almond Pie and a Chicken and Leek Cornish Turnover.

40.title: L.A. Food Trucks
40.plot: Giada visits some of her favorite food trucks around Los Angeles and then creates dishes inspired by them, like Pulled Pork Tacos, Grilled Cheese Sandwiches, Sweet Potato Fries, and Chocolate and Strawberry Crepes.

41.title: Just Desserts
41.plot: Prepared: amaretto chocolate tart with apricot cream; frozen meringue cake with raspberry-balsamic syrup.

42.title: L.A. Hot Spots: Breakfast
42.plot: "Giada at Home" explores some of the cool places around Los Angeles where you can go for breakfast; lemon-almond waffles; salami, bacon and spinach hash; breakfast popovers with Italian sausage; peach and basil frozen daiquiris;

43.title: Beer and Snacks
43.plot: Giada makes four great snacks: Sweet and Salty Nuts and Bacon; Italian Sausage, Three-Cheese and Beer Fondue; Beer-Battered Asparagus with Caper and Tarragon Dipping Sauce; and Popcorn with Herbes de Provence and Asiago Cheese.

44.title: Date Night
44.plot: Food is prepared for a date night. The menu includes grilled zucchini-and-prosciutto skewers, orecchiette with roasted fennel and sausage, and chocolate-raspberry mascarpone bars.

45.title: Oodles of Noodles
45.plot: Giada creates four distinct noodle recipes based on cuisines from around the world: Japanese Chilled Soba Noodle Salad, Italian Farfalle with Chicken and Porcini Mushrooms, Greek Pastitsio and Chinese Chocolate Chow Mein.

1.title: Haunted House
1.plot: Season 5 begins with recipes for a Halloween party. Included: grape-and-mango parfaits; chocolate-orange cake pops; and spiced pumpkin-raisin cookies.

2.title: Ethnic: Spanish Food
2.plot: Prepared: Spanish potato omelets; quick and easy romesco sauce; seafood; sausage and chicken fideua.

3.title: Thanksgiving Sides
3.plot: Thanksgiving side dishes are prepared. Recipes include baked-mashed potatoes with peas; Parmesan cheese and bread crumbs; sweet-and-savory-root-vegetable stuffing with apples and dried cranberries; and persimmon-pumpkin pie.

5.title: Share the Amore
5.plot: Appetizers and cocktails are created for an art show. Included: mini grilled-pork skewers; mini eggplant Parmesan; lemon-and-vodka martinis.

6.title: Happy Holidays
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Spa Day at Home
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Meatless Mondays
9.plot: Giada talks about the benefits of going meatless once a week and shares some vegetarian recipes, including avocado hummus; lentil burgers; and sweet-potato salad. Also: tostadas made with roasted vegetables.

10.title: Chicken Three Ways
10.plot: Giada prepares a chicken, which she uses for three separate dishes, including garlic-roasted chicken and root vegetables; risotto with bacon and kale; and curry-chicken-apple wraps.

11.title: Sports Bar Favorites
11.plot: Giada's take on sports-bar food. Included: sweet-and-sour pork, served on slider buns; sweet-potato strings with beet ketchup; beer-battered cremini mushrooms; and a beer cocktail.

13.title: Recipe for Romance
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

14.title: Meatball Madness
14.plot: Giada prepares 4 meatball recipes, including mini-turkey meatballs w/a mango-raspberry-balsamic BBQ sauce; meatball Panini w/grilled red onions, prosciutto & provolone cheese; white pizza with kale & meatballs; & Italian turkey meatballs.

15.title: Decadent Delights
15.plot: Three decadent recipes are prepared, including four-cheese ravioli with herb pesto; eggplant-Parmesan meatloaf; and chocolate-raspberry layer cake.

16.title: Nonna Luna's Recipe Diaries: Chapter 3
16.plot: Giada and her Aunt Raffy create three more dishes from Giada's grandmother's recipe book. This time they make a beautiful Frittata of Tuna and Tomatoes, Red Bell Peppers with Eggplant and an elegant Strawberry Omelet.

18.title: Spring Luncheon
18.plot: Recipes for a spring luncheon are prepared using fresh ingredients, including a puree of grilled artichoke and celery root; lemon-cumin chicken; and hibiscus panna cotta.

19.title: Milestone Recipes
19.plot: Recipes that represents milestone moments for Giada, including baked lemon ziti; mozzarella fonduta; rib-eye-steak paninis; and pink-grapefruit-and-thyme Bellinis.

21.title: Ladies Empowerment Lunch
21.plot: Giada honors three women who give to others by hosting a luncheon for them. The menu features Pan-Fried Salmon with Green Goddess Tzatziki, a Quinoa Salad with Roasted Eggplant and Apples and Iced Tea with Berries, Melon and Mint.

22.title: Venice Beach
22.plot: A menu inspired by the fresh flavors of Venice Beach, California, also has an Italian influence. Recipes include lemony shrimp-and-risotto; three-cheese-and-artichoke calzones; and citrus gelato.

24.title: Mexican Fiesta
24.plot: Giada De Laurentiis hosts a fiesta, inspired by LA's great Mexican food. Dishes include stuffed red peppers; chipotle shrimp served with arugula salad; an aqua fresca recipe with watermelon and strawberry; and tres-leches tiramisu.

25.title: Double Trouble Baby Shower
25.plot: Giada hosts a baby shower celebrating identical twin boys. The menu includes roasted red-pepper hummus in cucumber cups; pasta shells filled with chicken salad; open-face smoked salmon finger sandwiches with herb-horseradish cream cheese.

26.title: My Grandfather's Favorites
26.plot: Giada De Laurentiis and her Aunt Raffy make some family favorite recipes. The dinner menu includes fusilli with pea pesto and smoked mozzarella; lemon-mustard potato salad; and an orange-ricotta-quinoa pie.

28.title: Coast to Coast Barbecue
28.plot: Giada De Laurentiis finds great BBQ recipes reflecting the areas of the US. Prepared: pork sandwiches with white barbecue sauce; grilled salmon with sun-dried tomato butter; spiced beef brisket with smoky barbecue sauce; and grilled apples.

29.title: An Apple a Day
29.plot: Giada shares 3 amazing recipes with America's favorite fruit. Recipes include apple chips with sweet yogurt dip; grilled chicken with apple-mango chutney; and apple galette topped with goat cheese, sour cherry and almonds.

30.title: Father's Day Pasta
30.plot: Giada prepares a special Father's Day dinner. Recipes include bacon-and-cheese manicotti; spicy red-wine spaghetti; and meaty penne.

31.title: Muffin Mania
31.plot: Giada uses a recipe for corn muffins as a basis for other dishes, including blueberry-buttermilk muffins and bacon-and-scallion muffins. She also makes pea-lettuce-fennel soup and homemade chai latte.

32.title: Happy Birthday, Raffy
32.plot: Aunt Raffy turns 60 and Giada De Laurentiis throws a big birthday bash. On the menu: turkey-stuffed vegetables; gnocchi with tomato, basil and olives; and a special cake.

33.title: Planting the Seed
33.plot: Giada plants a garden at a Compton elementary school, with help from students and volunteers. Months later, she visits the kids and faculty, bringing with her a picnic lunch to share, including a pancetta-fontina-zucchini quiche.

34.title: Viewer's Choice 2
34.plot: Giada De Laurentiis creates meals, requested by her twitter followers. Recipes include corn and tomato soup, shrimp scampi; couscous with chicken and peas; blueberry-banana bread.

35.title: Jade's Dance Class
35.plot: Giada De Laurentiis creates a delicious lunch for Jade's dance class. The menu includes sweet apple pops; cheesy-muffin pizzas; and carrot fries with lemon-mint dip.

36.title: Pasta from Scratch
36.plot: Giada De Laurentiis shows how to make good Italian pasta from scratch. She also prepares recipes for creamy spinach-and-mushroom lasagna; roasted tomato soup with halibut and fresh pasta; fettuccine with figs, prosciutto and goat cheese.

38.title: Stuff It
38.plot: Giada De Laurentiis makes recipes based on things that are stuffed.

1.title: Career Day
1.plot: Giada De Laurentiis visits her daughter's school for a career day presentation and prepares a kid-friendly menu for the students. Included: sushi pinwheels; almond-butter mini-muffins with strawberry jam; and homemade fruit roll-ups.

2.title: Grilling with Bobby
2.plot: Giada De Laurentiis invites Bobby Flay for a day of fun in the kitchen.

3.title: Jade's Sleepover
3.plot: Giada De Laurentiis creates a delicious menu for Jade's sleep-over party. The menu includes crispy chicken tenders with piccata sauce; "pizza di rotelle"; and strawberry hot chocolate with chocolate-pretzel dippers.

4.title: Dim Sum
4.plot: A trip to Hong Kong inspired Giada De Laurentiis to make a dim sum menu, which includes chocolate bao with dipping sauce; braised short rib dumplings with corn puree; lemper ayam; and Gorgonzola-pear gyoza.

5.title: Diner Favorites
5.plot: Giada De Laurentiis puts an elegant spin on a diner classic, when she prepares a burger with the works, served with Parmesan-eggplant fries with basil ketchup. Also: a recipe for cupcake shakes.

6.title: Ghoulish Goodies
6.plot: Treats are made for a festive Halloween party. Recipes include pumpkin-maple-bacon cheesecake; witch finger cookies; brittle bones; and chocolate-fig black hats.

7.title: Casino Night
7.plot: Giada hosts a casino night party, inspired by her recent trip to Monte Carlo. On the menu: lobster risotto arancini; crostini w/poached figs, goat cheese and crispy pancetta; tangerine sorbet with vanilla ice cream and candied pistachios.

8.title: Thanksgiving Leftovers
8.plot: Giada De Laurentiis takes some traditional favorites and makes fun new twists to enjoy after the holiday. On the menu: Thankful Shepherd's Pie, Cranberry Barbecue Sliders with Celery Apple Slaw and Eggs Benedict on Stuffing Cakes.

9.title: Gifts Galore
9.plot: Giada De Laurentiis makes easy and delicious recipes that can be taken to any party, like Double Ginger Cookies, Crispy Chickpeas, Rosemary Cashews, Raw Goji Berry Trail Mix, Moscow Mule Cocktails, peanut-butter dog treats.

10.title: Christmas Brunch
10.plot: Nothing's better on Christmas morning than an amazing festive brunch. Giada and her Aunt Raffy create a menu that's savory and sweet. Dishes include breakfast lasagna, triple ginger soufflé and Todd's scramble and strawberry Santas.

11.title: Healthy and Hearty
11.plot: Giada De Laurentiis creates meals that feature vegetables as the main dish. Colorful dishes like Kale, Raisin and Pine Nut Soccas, Tuscan Barley and Vegetable Soup, Fettucine with Roasted Tomatoes and Peas and Fresh Mozzarella.

12.title: Easy Italian
12.plot: Giada De Laurentiis creates four tasty Italian dishes made with inexpensive ingredients like Cannellini Bean and Sausage Stew, Open-Faced Eggplant and Mushroom Sandwiches, Spicy Garlic and Anchovy Farfalle and Almond Affogato.

13.title: Game Day Goodies
13.plot: Giada De Laurentiis creates her spin on foods while watching the big game. The menu includes Sticky Pork Ribs with Balsamic Barbecue Sauce, Sweet Potato Tots with Dill Dust and Strawberry Wonton Cups with Orange Mascarpone.

14.title: Black and White
14.plot: Recipes featuring chocolate as the star ingredient, including chocolate fettuccine with peas and pancetta; white-chocolate risotto; and a black-and-white Italian cocktail.

15.title: Cocktails and Appetizers
15.plot: Giada hosts a poolside cocktail party, featuring appetizers inspired by traditional breakfast foods like French Toast Fingers with Ginger Bourbon Maple Syrup; Mini Smoked Frittatas with Chive Crème Fraiche; Scotch bonnet marmalade.

16.title: All Grown Up
16.plot: Giada puts a grown-up spin on three favorite recipes from her childhood, including franks and beans; mac and cheese with mushrooms; and strawberry-shortcake soup.

17.title: Giada's L.A. Vacation
17.plot: Giada puts her own spin on dishes, from tourist attractions in Los Angeles, including "Pink's Hot Dogs"; "Roscoe's House of Chicken and Waffles"; and pie from "Knott's Berry Farm".

18.title: Feel-Good Food
18.plot: Four healthy recipes that are full of flavor, but low in fat and calories. Included: egg-and-kale breakfast wraps; roasted vegetables with chipotle cream; grilled salmon and pineapple with avocado dressing; a banana-walnut smoothie.

19.title: Springtime in Italy
19.plot: A traditional Italian Eastern luncheon is prepared by Giada for her family. On the menu: springtime lamb; artichoke risotto; a whipped ricotta salad.

20.title: Recipe Swap
20.plot: Giada makes spicy-citrus popcorn; and learns her aunt's recipe for quinoa-and-ceci soup. Also: peanut-butter-expresso brownies.

21.title: Spice of Life
21.plot: Giada De Laurentiis turns up the heat as she creates fiery recipes from around the globe like Vietnamese Red Snapper with Noodles, Vegetable Paella, Spiced Beef Kabobs with Cucumber Yogurt Sauce and Moroccan Chocolate Mousse.

22.title: Lunch with Mom
22.plot: Giada makes a Mother's Day lunch for her sister and their kids. On the menu: crostini with strawberry-tomato jam; and prosciutto-cucumber crostini with arugula mustard. Also: fusilli with sun-dried tomato vinaigrette.

23.title: Mini Me
23.plot: Giada makes mini versions of her favorite recipes for a party. On the menu: antipasto calzones; roasted fingerling potatoes with lemon-parsley aioli; ricotta-cinnamon meatballs; and chocolate-honey-almond tartlets.

24.title: California Dream
24.plot: Three California-inspired recipes are prepared for a backyard feast with friends. On the menu: lettuce cups; Gorgonzola burgers; and angel food cupcakes with lemon curd and mascarpone frosting.

25.title: My Thai
25.plot: A trip to Thailand inspires Giada to create an exotic dinner at home. On the menu: Thai curry, naked spring rolls, and a sweet Thai iced tea.

26.title: Summer Splash
26.plot: Giada hosts a summertime pool party in her backyard, and serves her guests grilled shrimp with a goat-cheese dipping sauce, gazpacho sandwiches, mascarpone-filled watermelon, and refreshing spa water.

1.title: Kids in the Kitchen
1.plot: Giada offers a cooking class for her daughter and friends. The kid-friendly menu includes pizza popcorn; green spears and ham; a salad of snap peas and Parmesan; and pound-cake sandwiches with strawberry whipped cream.

2.title: Giada's Vegas Favorites
2.plot: Giada demonstrates recipes from her Las Vegas restaurant, which features cuisine that's Italian with a California twist. Included: chicken Marsala meatballs; lemon spaghetti with jumbo shrimp; and Tuscan rib-eye steak.

3.title: Giada's Korean Barbecue
3.plot: Chef Roy Choi leads Giada on a tour of Koreatown in Los Angeles, which inspires her to go home and cook Korean barbecue beef, spicy sesame bok choy, vegetarian noodles, and a kimchi pancake.

4.title: Giada's Quick and Easy Favorites
4.plot: Four recipes, that are quick and easy, are prepared. On the menu: Calabrian chili pasta; open-faced red snapper sandwiches; kale-and-hummus salad; bananas Foster.

5.title: Cooking with Raffy and Buzz
5.plot: Giada prepares family favorites, with help from her Aunt Raffy. The menu features escarole pie, pizza rustica and pizza with Buzz.

6.title: Ciao Chow!
6.plot: Four Italian small plates are prepared. The menu includes Jade's BBP; hazelnut brittle; ravioli made with crispy fig and Gorgonazola; and breakfast PLTs.

7.title: Halloween Goodies
7.plot: Giada De Laurentiis hosts an old school Halloween party for Jade and her pals. Giada transforms her backyard into a pumpkin patch and the kids decorate pumpkins and snack on traditional treats.

8.title: Giving Thanks
8.plot: Giada serves a traditional Thanksgiving feast, with a few twists. On the menu: turkey breast "porchetta"; bacon-bourbon-Brussels-sprout skewers; and smashed root vegetables.

9.title: Slumber Party with Alie and Georgia
9.plot: Giada prepares breakfast-style food to share at Alie Ward and Georgia Hardstark's live comedy show at the Hollywood Improv in Los Angeles. On the menu: Bloody Mary dip; silver-dollar-pancake sandwiches; eggs Benedict deviled eggs.

10.title: An Italian Christmas
10.plot: Giada hosts Christmas Eve dinner to celebrate the Feast of the Seven Fishes with her Italian family. On the menu: tangerine-and-herb branzino; New Orleans-style barbecued shrimp; crispy oysters Rockefeller.

11.title: Garden Spa Day
11.plot: Giada plans a menu for a day of pampering with her girlfriends. Included: farro-and-kale salad; peas and carrots; almond-and-peach toasts. Also: a homemade facial/body scrub and spa water.

12.title: Festive Desserts
12.plot: Delectable desserts for a fancy party are prepared. Recipes include espresso cake with Tuscan-liquor buttercream and caramel glass. Also: a walnut-rosemary tart with orange-Chantilly cream.

13.title: Restaurant Tips
13.plot: Giada offers tips for how to cook restaurant-style dishes at home. On the menu: pan-seared salmon with summer succotash; penne with pork ragout; and New York strip steak with red-wine butter.

imdb.plot outline: Be Giada De Laurentiis' guest as she puts together meals meant for entertaining friends and family. Whether it's a festive bash or an intimate meal, in her own kitchen or at the beach, it's a day of memorable food and fun with Giada at Home.
imdb.title: Giada at Home
plot: Be Giada De Laurentiis' guest as she puts together meals meant for entertaining friends and family. Whether it's a festive bash or an intimate meal, in her own kitchen or at the beach, it's a day of memorable food and fun with _Giada at Home_ (qv).

Be Giada DeLaurentiis' guest as she puts together meals meant for entertaining friends and family. Whether it's a festive bash or an intimate meal, in her own kitchen or at the beach, it's a day of memorable food and fun with _Giada at Home_ (qv).
